THE ART OF IT ALL

Condado is more than the freshest tacos and margs in town. Condado is a place to come as you are, soak up the local vibe, and feel connected. Condado Celebrates individuality and we dig being original. Every Condado restaurant is unique with hand-painted murals by local artists.

Mt. Pleasant Reviews
LEAVE A REVIEW 
Sort By
Star Rating Date 
Jonetta Gaddis

Monday, February 10, 2025

5 out of 5

Awesome, artistic atmosphere! Jamming music too! One of the managers, Ashley, is exceptional. She came over and greeted me and made sure I was a satisfied customer. Which, I was. I had the chicken tacos and queso and rice. Make sure you also ask for Cara. A great waitress! I would definitely recommend Condado's Tacos!

Travel Teacher

Anjah

Tuesday, December 17, 2024

5 out of 5

Anjah at Condado Tacos was amazing! She made our meal fun with her friendly and quirky attitude. She was quick, knew the menu well, and took great care of us. We’ll be back for sure. Thanks, Anjah!

Fresa H

Saturday, August 24, 2024

5 out of 5

Texas took great care of us. She walked us through the menu and her recommendations were on point. Her Margaritas were delicious! Both service and food were perfect.

Texas s

Monday, July 1, 2024

5 out of 5

Kind lady

Sven V

Saturday, March 16, 2024

5 out of 5

Awesome food, fresh and full of flavor. Made our own bowls full of protein and double-deckers are a must try. Lucy is the best.

Anita W.

Sunday, February 18, 2024

4 out of 5

Definitely a vibe... the atmosphere was nice, food was good..mango guac(new) was not my fav..but the smoky cheddar queso!!! Yaaasss was definitely good and i will return just for that.. my husband enjoyed the tacos, need a little more meat though..gave him Taco bell vibes with the meat portion.. overall good.. will return

Ethan C

Sunday, November 26, 2023

5 out of 5

Wonderful atmosphere and food. Highly recommend!Taja was a great help with the menu and service!

Bobbie C

Sunday, November 12, 2023

5 out of 5

Great place for tacos and margaritas. The decor is very interesting...good vibe. We went for lunch and didn't have to wait long. Our server Jonathon was friendly and had us in and out on our lunch break within an hour. Will be going back!
LEAVE A REVIEW
